content:
1. Image/Content Discovery: Users can search and discover new images and ideas related to their interests.
2. Image Sharing: Users can share and upload their own images and categorize them into boards.
3. Board Creation: Users can create boards to organize and categorize their saved images and ideas.
4. Follow/Unfollow: Users can follow other users, boards and topics to see their content in their feed.
5. Repinning: Users can save and share other users' images to their own boards.
6. Image Commenting: Users can add comments to images and start conversations with other users.
7. Image Tagging: Users can tag other users and products in images.
8. Personalization: Users can personalize their feed, boards, and profile to match their interests.
9. Image Recommendations: The app can provide image recommendations based on users' past interactions and behavior.
10. Notifications: Users can receive notifications for new images, comments, and followers.
